page.title: 03ICKFORD (continued)
page.content: There are two Pubs _ one called the Rising Sun and it is run by Eric Chin. It has quite a big garden with swings and a baby rocker.The Royal Oak is run by Ron Cherry. Old Reg the old road sweeper is a regular visitor.The Rising Sun is the most popular of the two pubs.A lot of people like the river.The two bridges over the river were built 300 years ago.There is a paddling area where you can paddle. There are lots of fishermen partic- ularly on the 1st day of the season. The whirly pool is popular for fishing too. The part of the village called Little Ickford has a road and a pond.The road is called Bulls Lane. BY LYN COCKSHOTT & DAVID BAKER
